description:
Resolume Arena is an Instrument for VJs, AV performers and video artists.

Resolume Arena is an instrument for VJs, AV performers and video artists. Resolume Arena puts all your media and effects right at your fingertips, so you can quickly play and improvise your live visuals. Arena expands on Avenue and has advanced options for projection mapping and blending projectors. Control it from a lighting desk and sync to the DJ via SMPTE timecode.
